course_title: Mental Health Care and Delivery in Indigenous Communities

002.comments: Please contact the Centre for Excellence in Indigenous Health for registrationMeeting Dates and Times:Monday February 17 to Friday February 21, 20208:30 am to 12:00 pmClassroom SPPH B104Faculty: Dr. Nadine Caron  and  Dr. Patricia Spittal

description: Approaches to mental health and resilience concepts and strength based interventions with Indigenous communities.
